snippet: Former Gov. Mark Sanford secured the Republican nomination and will face Elizabeth Colbert Busch in the race for South Carolina’s First Congressional District, which is solidly Republican. But this election is not typical.
abstract: Former Gov. Mark Sanford secured the Republican nomination and will face Elizabeth Colbert Busch in the race for South Carolina’s First Congressional District, which is solidly Republican. But this election is not typical.

headline.main: Why Sanford vs. Colbert Busch Could Be Competitive
